text: ยง 13-517 Retirement board; reports. The retirement board shall publish annually a report certified to by each member showing the condition of the various funds provided for by this chapter, and setting forth such other facts, recommendations, and data, as may be of use in the advancement of knowledge concerning teachers' pensions and annuities. Such board shall submit such report to the mayor, and shall file at least fifty copies thereof with the board of education for the use of such board and its members, at least one copy in each school for the use of the teachers thereof, one copy in the office of the superintendent of schools, of each associate superintendent of schools and of each assistant superintendent of schools.
